skill_html_structure_desc: Basic structure of an HTML document, meaning of tags <!DOCTYPE>, <html>, <head>, <body>.
skill_tags_attributes_desc: Most important HTML tags, tag attributes, nesting elements.
skill_head_section_desc: Proper construction of the <head> section, use of meta tags, page title, linking styles and scripts.
skill_page_structure_desc: Creating page structure using sections, articles, headers, lists, paragraphs.
skill_lists_links_images_desc: Creating ordered and unordered lists, linking pages, embedding images and alternative text.
skill_tables_desc: Creating and styling tables, using table headers, merging cells.
skill_best_practices_desc: Avoiding obsolete tags, writing clean and readable code, formatting and comments.
skill_creating_forms_desc: Form elements, <form> attributes, various input types, buttons.
skill_form_validation_desc: Validation attributes (required, pattern), error messages, best practices.
skill_canvas_svg_desc: Drawing graphics using <canvas>, using SVG for scalable vector graphics.
skill_aria_wcag_desc: Implementation of ARIA roles and attributes, ensuring WCAG compliance.
skill_alt_text_semantics_desc: Using the alt attribute for images, importance of semantics for accessibility.
skill_form_accessibility_desc: Using <label>, <fieldset>, <legend>, ensuring accessibility for screen readers.
skill_metadata_optimization_desc: Using meta tags, meta description, meta keywords, importance for SEO.
skill_heading_structure_desc: Proper use of headings h1-h6, importance for SEO and accessibility.
skill_loading_speed_desc: HTML code optimization, minification, asynchronous script loading.
skill_progressive_enhancement_desc: Creating pages accessible to various browsers and devices, adding functionality as capabilities allow.
skill_html_apis_desc: Using the contenteditable attribute, drag and drop, <details> element, <dialog>.
skill_web_components_desc: Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, Templates and their application.
